b"Not signed up for #CHC2020 yet? Here are the stories of two of our #fitness heroes for a little inspiration.

Sunil George has been the Kochi Program Lead and one of our ambassadors for Cognizant Health Challenge for the past two years. Here\xe2\x80\x99s his career advice \xe2\x80\x93 \xe2\x80\x9cThe challenge reinforces the importance of fitness and its significance in our professional life. Personally, it has helped me in achieving many of my personal goals. I have completed three full marathons, 40+ half marathons and a few long distance cycling events.\xe2\x80\x9d
